googleLanguageR
  • Reference

Reference version 0.0.0.9000

All functions

gl_auth

Auth with Google Translate API

gl_nlp

Perform Natural Language Analysis on text

gl_speech_recognise

Call Google Speech API

gl_translate_detect

Detect the language of text within a request

gl_translate_language

Translate the language of text within a request

gl_translate_list

List languages from Google Translate API
